resources.string: COVID-19 is a new infectious disease caused by Coronavirus. It is a respiratory virus that spreads through an infected persons sneeze, cough or speech. It can also spread through surfaces an infected person has been in contact with.

Common symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, dry cough and tiredness. Less common symptoms are aches and pains, sore throat, diarrhea, headaches and loss of taste or smell. Serious symptoms are difficulty breathing or shortness of breath, chest pain and loss of speech or movement.
